translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding casefile {{.casefile_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}. Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action completed
New action request! {{.action_title}}.
New action request
The following action was assigned to you: {{.action_title}}.
An action has been assigned to you
The action {{.action_title}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}. Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action completed
{{.assignee}} accepted an action you assigned ({{.action_title}}). Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action accepted
{{.assignee}} rejected and assigned an action back to you ({{.action_title}}). Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action rejected
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}
Action almost overdue
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}. Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action almost overdue
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}.
Action overdue
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}. Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
Action overdue
{{.owner}} has reassigned the action {{.action_title}} to someone else. You are no longer responsible.
Action reassigned
A new permission was given to you. You can now use {{.app_name}} as a/an {{.role}}. Click here to go to {{.app_name}}.
Your administrator has reset your password. Click here to create a new password.

translation.one: Successfully imported {{.number}} user. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.
translation.other: Successfully imported {{.number}} users. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.

translation: A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observator}}. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
New observation
Warning! A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observator}}. This might require your immediate attention. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
Warning! High priority observation

A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observator}}. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection '{{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}'. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
New observation generated from inspection

Warning! A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observator}}. This might require your immediate attention. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection '{{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}'. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
Warning! High priority observation generated from inspection
New publication available! '{{.title}}'.
New publication available!

{{.user}} contributed to your casefile {{.casefile_name}}.
Casefile contribution
The following casefile was assigned to you by {{.assigner}}: {{.casefile_name}}. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
Casefile assigned
The following casefile has not been updated for two weeks and is still open: {{.casefile_name}}. Click here to view it in ObservationChanger.
Casefile pending

Observation archived
Your observation {{.refnumber}} was used by {{.manager}} to create a casefile.
Observation used for casefile
Hi! Welcome to ObservationChanger. Take a minute to add an observation!
Hi! Welcome to ObservationChanger!

translation.one: A report was shared with you by {{.sender}} showing {{.X}} over {{.Y}} for {{.number}} Location. Click here to view it in ReportChanger.
translation.other: A report was shared with you by {{.sender}} showing {{.X}} over {{.Y}} for {{.number}} Locations. Click here to view it in ReportChanger.

translation: How are you doing? We noticed you didn’t login yet. Satisfied? Questions? Reach out to support. Busy? We hope you’ll find time to use our great product. Click here to discover SafetyChanger.
